title: Karen Read investigator Michael Proctor drops appeal to reverse State Police firing
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News The ex-trooper withdrew his appeal following unspecified “disclosures” Friday, his attorney said.
Trooper Michael Proctor in court.

Greg Derr/The Patriot Ledger, Pool By Abby Patkin October 20, 2025 | 3:25 PM 2 minutes to read Fired over his conduct during Karen Read’s high-profile murder case, former Massachusetts State Police Trooper Michael Proctor has dropped his Civil Service Commission appeal to get his old job back, his lawyer said Monday.
